name: Slackinviter
description: Let people invite themselves to your Slack

SLACKINVITER_SLACKTOKEN.description: A Slack API token (find it on https://api.slack.com/web)

SLACKINVITER_SLACKINVITESCHANNELID.description: A Private Channel id where new invites log is posted to

SLACKINVITER_CODEOFCONDUCTURL.description: a link to your desired code of conduct page
